action_delete_messages.description: Flat button [Clear for All] (hard-delete all messages)

badge_you.description: Badge for indicating the current user

block_contact_warning.translation: Möchten Sie diesen Kontakt wirklich blockieren?
block_contact_warning.defaultMessage: Are you sure you want to block this contact?

channel.description: Subtitle shown for channels in MessagesView instead of last seen

channel_prompt.description: Checkbox label when creating a channel

chat_invitation.translation: Sie sind eingeladen, an einem neuen Chat teilzunehmen. Was möchten Sie tun?
chat_invitation.defaultMessage: You are invited to start a new chat. What would you like to do?

clear_messages_warning.defaultMessage: Are you sure you want to clear all messages? It cannot be undone.

code_doesnot_match.description: Error message when the credential validation code is incorrect.

delete_messages_warning.defaultMessage: Are you sure you want to delete all messages for everyone? It cannot be undone.
delete_messages_warning.description: Alert dialog warning when hard-deleting all messages.

email_dative.description: Dative case of 'email', i.e. 'email' in 'by email'

phone_dative.description: Dative case of 'phone', i.e. 'phone' in 'by phone'
